title: Poor Doublelift: TSM is Dumb and they don't Understand him
body:
Doublelift did nothing wrong!
He makes great choices, see? He was soloing the dragon while **NRG** were doing Baron!

http://i.imgur.com/1gKvk5m.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/XDbfmlT.jpg

Wait... http://orig00.deviantart.net/6e5f/f/2015/066/3/2/twitch_emoticon___wutface_by_centaurman_plz-d8krjib.png

replies.body: That's a horrible shot call by whoever was shotcalling. Don't ever solo the dragon like that over something like baron unless it's your 5th dragon. They were supposed to be contesting baron. Doublelift was around 9/2 I believe and he should have been more useful at baron with some kind of initiation ult with yellowstar. It was technically a 3v5 at baron because yellowstar couldn't jump into the fight without doublelift ult. A well coordinated doubelift ult could've turned favor to TSM and get baron to end the game.
He is saying that it is an overall team shotcall and its impossible to know if doublelift is the one who made the decision or if it was someone else and doublelift was just listening to the call.

No, I'm just making fun of the idiot.
This is Solo Queue Level

Team: _"Kalista, they are doing Baron and you are doing dragon all by yourself"_
Kalista: _"stfu i get pentakill i carry u pentakill wins games oh we lost"_

Both TSM and NRG were competing for the "Yolo queue award" in this game...

TSM-> mute the chat, play by themselves

NRG->afk farm into ARAM into ace

Isn't this what you do at yolo queue?
The "he" is refering to Astrophel. Not to you.

really you show that screen?
how about the screen where tsm has a 10k lead they start baron and doublelift is at 50% hp?
or how about the screen from iem vs team ever where tsm has ONCE AGAIN a 10k gold lead, doubleshit plays blue ez and they start baron with doublelift at 300 mana?

its so sad that ppl blame everyone on tsm besides doubleshift.

I agree with Astrophel even when the post is mocking DL, you can see the highlights of the game here
TSM vs NRG

**http://themoment.tv/playlist/1731**
